name: Mega Tile
description:
Mega Tile is a grid-based puzzle game where you move your player through directional arrows you set down on the grid. Many obstacles are added to make each level a mind-bending experience!

Please leave a comment if the prototype has any bugs or glitches! Also, give feedback of any sort, if you liked the prototype or if you didn't.

You don't need java to run the game since i packaged the jre with the game in a zip file, unless if you're running mac, then open the data folder then double click mt.jar!

EDIT: I'm not working on this game right now.

Thanks!!!
